sections.title: Homecooked meals delivered straight to your door.
Amazing food without the hassle
sections.subtitle: It's ready to go
sections.content:
Whether it's for a romantic evening with your significant other or if you're hosting a large party and need food for a big group, we're here to help!

We can cater to whatever your needs are, and ensure that our delicious food is delivered at the perfect moment, fresh, hot, and ready to eat exactly when you need it to be there.

sections.title: We make great food
sections.subtitle: Cooking is our passion, with quality and freshness being of the utmost importance

cards.title: Fresh ingredients
cards.content: We take food seriously, and the first thing to making great food is using fresh ingredient. If the ingredients don't meet our standard, we don't use them.

cards.title: Professional chef
cards.content: Chef Wellington is a professionally trained chef who's worked in top kitchens around the world.

cards.title: Ready for you
cards.content: Stop using services where you have to re-heat your food. We get it to your door ready to eat, without sacrificing any quality at all.

cards.title: Made with love
cards.content: Food is our passion, and we infuse that love and passion into every single plate that we make and deliver straight to your home.

sections.title: What our clients are saying about us.

cards.text: John Wellington and his team make the most amazing food. Every single time I've ordered, I've been blown-away by the quality. You can tell they only use fresh ingredients and put a lot of love into every single meal they make! You really can't ask for anything more, it's always fantastic.
cards.author: John Deer

cards.text: I'm so happy that I found John Wellington! The food is on par with some of the best restaurants I've ever eaten at, but from the comfort of my own home. Every single time I order, it's mouthwateringly delicious.
cards.author: Marie Condo

cards.text: From simple meals to some of the most extravagant things I've ever eaten, John and his team always deliver. Every time I order something new, I just can't wait for it to be delivered and I know how mouth-wateringly delicious it's going to be. If you like good food you have to give it a try!
cards.author: Sam Reinhert
